name: TruPath MVC Framework
short_description: TruPath is yet another PHP5 implementation of the MVC pattern. It aims to be a simple, no-frills, easy to use framework for seperation of display and buissness logic. It features XML sitemaps, pipeline cacheing, XSL and PHP views, and other goodies.
